Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Models

Class BallModel

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Models.BallModel
public class BallModel extends Object
This is the class of the ball, which defines the basic attributes of the ball, which includes the radius, ball's bound and the ball's position property.
It also provides methods to access and modify some attributes.
Ball's radius property is not allowed to change once it has been defined.
Version:
Version2.0
update: Jan 3rd
Author:
Lin CHEN- modified

    • BallModel

      public BallModel(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB)
      This constructor accepts the basic ball settings and stores the value.
      After this constructor, the setting of the ball is done.
      Parameters:
      center - ball's expected start center
      radiusA - ball's x radius
      radiusB - ball's y radius

    • updatePoints

      public void updatePoints()
      This function updates the position of the ball. 
       
  Modified from the original source code:
  public void setPoints(double width,double height){
      up.setLocation(center.getX(),center.getY()-(height / 2));
      down.setLocation(center.getX(),center.getY()+(height / 2));

      left.setLocation(center.getX()-(width / 2),center.getY());
      right.setLocation(center.getX()+(width / 2),center.getY());
  }

    • setM_Center

      public void setM_Center(javafx.geometry.Point2D center)
      This function resets the ball's center.
      Parameters:
      center - ball's new center
